duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare wafers for experimentation to include cleaning, loading wafers, preparing reactor for experimentation, and cleaning reactors.
Evaluate performance of process system and record process conditions and experimental observations.
Operate scanning electron microscope (SEM) for cross-section and top view analysis, identify patterns of interest, and understand image quality requirement.
Prepare graphs and tables summarizing results and interface with requestors, understand their detailed requirements, and communicate results.
Order equipment and supplies, coordinate with vendors and purchasing, perform routine shut-down procedure, and set up equipment for experiments.

education_certification.credential: Technical Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
